results.name: a(0)=1; thereafter positive numbers that are congruent to {0, 1, 3, 5} mod 6.
reference: A. V. Shutov, On the number of words of a given length in plane crystallographic groups (Russian), Zap. Nauchn. Sem. S.-Peterburg. Otdel. Mat. Inst. Steklov. (POMI) 302 (2003), Anal. Teor. Chisel i Teor. Funkts. 19, 188--197, 203; translation in J. Math. Sci. (N.Y.) 129 (2005), no. 3, 3922-3926 [MR2023041]. See Table 1, line "p31m".
